acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was acquired through gift and purchase, 1960-present.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of prints and photographs of American authors and other literary figures in the Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature.
See verso of Willard, Emma Hart
See Crane, Stephen and Brandon Lily

did.unittitle: Harvard professors including Holmes, Longfellow, Lowell
